import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function SignUp() { let [signUpData, setSignUpData]= useState([]) function handleInput(e) { setSignUpData([...signUpData, e.target.name]) } function handleSignUpInput () { const newSignUpData = { id: signUpData.id, firstname: signUpData.firstname, lastname: signUpData.lastname, email: signUpData.email, password: signUpData.password, username: signUpData.username, } setSignUpData ([...signUpData, newSignUpData]) } return (








By clicking the "SignUp" button below, you agree to all terms and conditions

Sign Up
); }
